```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
area = sample(10:25,1)
squares = list(c(0,0))
for(i in 1:(area-1)){
    cango = F
    while(length(squares)<=i){
        sqn = sample(1:length(squares),1)
        sq = squares[[sqn]]
        delta = sample(c(-1,1),1)
        delsq = sample(c(delta,0))
        newsq = sq+delsq
        if(!(list(newsq) %in% squares) && max(abs(newsq))<=5){
            squares[[i+1]] = newsq
        }
    }
}
```
